channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Tree pot hole and cleaning Linthorpe Road M16, 16th July
item.description:
Tree pot hole danger to public for years please fix , can Hackney council clean around all base of trees from top to bottom of Linthorpe Road N16 not done in months.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Linthorpe Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Base is trees not cleaned Linthorpe Road N16, 16th July
item.description:
Can the Hackney council clean all base of trees on Linthorpe not been done for months, as cleaning both sides of pavement not just one side. Thanks

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Linthorpe Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 5.55pm tuesday 15 july 2025 Antisocisl behaviour from 57 phillipp street n1 5pa Mark statham and three of his friends sitting in car on phillipp street. One of mark statham friend got out the car an hid drugs and knife in the bushes outside catherine house, 16th July

item.title: 2nd broken bench, 16th July
item.description:
1 bench OUTSIDE the garden square (the modern benches right opposite the Eliz Line entrance) has a broken metal armrest which needs reattaching. I know this is a very similar report to the one I just made, but it is two separate benches ! Thanks so much WCC you are fantastic.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18, Hanover Square, Mayfair, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Donnie’s, Noise, Light, and Odour Disturbance After Closing Hours, 16th July
item.description:
Despite closing at 11 pm, the restaurant continues noisy cleaning, staff voices, ventilation system, bright lighting, and emits strong smells well past midnight. These disturbances regularly affect our sleep and rest

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Westgate Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
